name: repro-screenshot-chrome-crash
description: Reproduce a bug in Chrome that crashes the browser when taking a screenshot

scripts.start: docker rm -fv repro-screenshot-chrome-crash; docker run --name repro-screenshot-chrome-crash -d -p 9222:9222 --cap-add SYS_ADMIN repro-screenshot-chrome-crash && node index.js || docker logs repro-screenshot-chrome-crash
scripts.start:yuki: docker rm -fv repro-screenshot-chrome-crash; docker run --name repro-screenshot-chrome-crash -d -p 9222:9222 --cap-add SYS_ADMIN yukinying/chrome-headless-browser:69.0.3497.23 && node index.js || docker logs repro-screenshot-chrome-crash
